# shouldRemovePresentersView

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the presenting view controller’s view should be removed when the presentation animations finish.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var shouldRemovePresentersView: Bool { get }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the view should be removed or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it should not.

## Discussion

The default implementation of this method returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. If you implement a presentation that does not cover the presenting view controller’s content entirely, override this method and return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

If you override this method, do not call `super`.

## Getting the presentation attributes

- **presentationStyle**: The presentation style of the presented view controller.
- **adaptivePresentationStyle(for:)**: Returns the presentation style to use for the specified set of traits.
- **adaptivePresentationStyle**: Returns the presentation style to use when the presented view controller becomes horizontally compact.
- **shouldPresentInFullscreen**: A Boolean value indicating whether the presentation covers the entire screen.
